name: Bittium Corporation
description: Bittium Corporation is a Finnish technology company specializing in advanced wireless communication and medical technology solutions. Founded in 1985, Bittium focuses on developing secure communication solutions for defense and public safety, as well as innovative medical technology products. The company is known for its ruggedized mobile devices and high-performance connectivity solutions designed for challenging environments. Bittium's product portfolio includes secure communication systems, integrated medical devices, and software solutions for wireless healthcare applications. With a commitment to enhancing the safety and security of communication, Bittium also plays a significant role in the development of IoT (Internet of Things) technologies, ensuring reliable connectivity for critical applications. The company emphasizes research and development, investing in new technologies to maintain its competitive edge in the fast-evolving tech landscape. Bittium operates globally, serving a diverse range of customers, including government agencies, healthcare providers, and private enterprises, striving to create a safer and more connected world.
